A publication of the royal authority, of the most serene, most mighty, and most august monarch, James the Seventh by the grace of God King of Scotland, England, France, and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c. Scotland. Privy Council. Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII).
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., Edinburgh, : Anno Dom. 1685.
Caption title. Initial letter. Title vignette: royal seal with initials J R. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
=======
